title: NBRC Recruitment 2026 - Apply Offline for Senior Project Associate Posts
description: The National Brain Research Centre (NBRC)has recently released the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for Senior Project Associate Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech, and M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the NBRC Recruitment 2026 . Here, we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can apply before the last date of a...
